thread.section_title: Hallowood Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hallowood Furniture | www.hallowood.co.uk | 2 of 59
thread.title: CollectPlus Customer Julie T
thread.title_full: Hallowood Furniture reviewed by CollectPlus Customer Julie T

author: CollectPlus Customer Julie T
title: CollectPlus Customer Julie T
text:
Very pleased with service and product delivered by Hallowood. Small sideboard was a second piece to go with an existing unit. Looks lovely placed in our hallway. Solid wood, well made. Delivery service excellent - called me early to give estimate time of arrival.
Unfortunately first delivered unit was damaged however, Hallowood dealt with problem immediately and replaced without issue.
